verses.verse: To you I do lift up <WH5375> my eyes, <WH5869> you who sit <WH3427> in the heavens. <WH8064>

Behold, <WH5869> as the eyes of servants <WH5650> look to the hand <WH3027> of their master, <WH113> as the eyes <WH5869> of a maid <WH8198> to the hand <WH3027> of her mistress; <WH1404> so our eyes <WH5869> look to Yahweh, <WH3068> our God, <WH430> until he has mercy on us. <WH2603>
Have mercy <WH2603> on us, <WH3068> Yahweh, have mercy <WH2603> on us, <WH7227> for we have endured much <WH7646> contempt. <WH937>
Our soul <WH5315> is exceedingly <WH7227> filled <WH7646> with the scoffing <WH3933> of those who are at ease, <WH7600> with the contempt <WH937> of the proud. <WH1343>
